ValidationRule.description: Case Select Re-Closed only when status is Re-Open
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status ), 'Open') || ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status ),'Tech Issue-SR Assigned') || ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Cancelled')|| ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status ), 'Done')) && ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Re-Closed') && $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Re-Closed status could be selected only when the status is Re-Open.
